statements: SELECT * FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE activation_level > 0.5
SELECT exercise_id, activation_level FROM muscle_activation_patterns ORDER BY exercise_id DESC
SELECT participant_id, activation_level FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT participant_id FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE activation_level < 0.3
SELECT * FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE participant_id = 3 AND exercise_id = 5
SELECT * FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE participant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT exercise_id, AVG(activation_level) AS average_activation FROM muscle_activation_patterns GROUP BY exercise_id HAVING average_activation > 0.5
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(exercise_id) AS total_exercises FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY participant_id
SELECT MAX(activation_level) AS max_activation, MIN(activation_level) AS min_activation FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE exercise_id = 3
SELECT participant_id, exercise_id, activation_level FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE activation_level BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY exercise_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MuscleActivationPatterns;
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group FROM MuscleActivationPatterns WHERE activation_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM ExerciseSessions WHERE intensity_level BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT exercise_name, activation_level FROM MuscleActivationPatterns ORDER BY activation_level DESC;
SELECT session_date, duration_minutes FROM ExerciseSessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MuscleActivationPatterns WHERE activation_level > 50 ORDER BY muscle_group DESC, id ASC
SELECT exercise_name, COUNT(*) FROM MuscleActivationPatterns GROUP BY exercise_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT muscle_group, AVG(activation_level) AS avg_activation FROM MuscleActivationPatterns GROUP BY muscle_group
SELECT * FROM ExerciseSessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND intensity_level >= 3 ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT exercise_name, intensity_level FROM MuscleActivationPatterns INNER JOIN ExerciseSessions ON MuscleActivationPatterns.id = ExerciseSessions.exercise_id ORDER BY exercise_name ASC
SELECT * FROM MuscleActivationPatterns;
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group FROM MuscleActivationPatterns WHERE activation_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM ExerciseCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, study_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchStudies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_studies FROM ResearchStudies;
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group, activation_level FROM MuscleActivationPatterns;
SELECT * FROM ExerciseCategories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchStudies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group, activation_level FROM MuscleActivationPatterns WHERE activation_level > 50 ORDER BY activation_level DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM ExerciseCategories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM muscle_activation_patterns;
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group FROM muscle_activation_patterns WHERE activation_level > 0.8;
SELECT id, exercise_name FROM exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT DISTINCT target_muscle_group FROM exercises;
SELECT * FROM muscle_activation_patterns
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level='Hard' ORDER BY exercise_name ASC
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT exercise_name, muscle_group, activation_level FROM muscle_activation_patterns JOIN exercises ON muscle_activation_patterns.exercise_name = exercises.exercise_name WHERE activation_level > 0.7
SELECT * FROM muscle_groups ORDER BY muscle_group_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM Exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT group_name FROM MuscleGroups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT exercise_name, activation_percentage FROM Exercises JOIN MuscleActivationPatterns ON Exercises.id = MuscleActivationPatterns.exercise_id;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) FROM MuscleGroups GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM Exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 2 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT exercise_name, activation_percentage FROM Exercises JOIN MuscleActivationPatterns ON Exercises.id = MuscleActivationPatterns.exercise_id WHERE activation_percentage > 0.5;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, exercise_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM ExerciseLogs GROUP BY user_id, exercise_id HAVING total_duration > 30 ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
